title: Science Learning Design Using Constructivist Microworlds and Digital Tool Support

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Provides flexible learning environments for time-constrained working learners. Emphasizes constructivist learning experiences using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can understand the principles of constructivist microworlds and apply them to science curriculum design.
Learners can design learner-centered, customized science learning activities using digital tools.
Learners can use cognitive modeling tools for scientific concepts to design effective learning experiences.
Learners can iteratively improve their learning designs through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
